Articles.Content: Has anyone made an MM config to create a 5m stock fairing base by resizing the 3.75m base? please share

Ok, I made one myself. If anyone wants, just make a config file with this text and you'll get a 5m fairing part:


+PART[fairingSize3]
{
    %name = fairingSize4


    @MODEL
    {
    %scale = 1.33,1,1.33
    }


%title = AE-FF4 Airstream Protective Shell (5m)
%mass = 0.64
%bulkheadProfiles = size4


    @MODULE[ModuleProceduralFairing]
    {    


        %baseRadius = 2.5
        %maxRadius = 8
        %xSectionHeightMax = 7
    }
}
I just use Tweakscale and download mods.
